review_data.title: Cool, nett aber in höchsten Mass ineffizient
review_data.content: Eigentlich ideal gelegen mir schöner Terasse im edlen zürcher Seefeld wäre die Voraussetzungen optimal. Es bleibt viel Raum für Verbesserungen!...More

review_data.title: No no no
review_data.content: Ich komme regelmässig ins Monocle und jedes Mal das gleiche Bild ..so viele Barrista hinter der Theke aber so schlecht...More

review_data.title: Bad service, small portions, bad coffee, cold service....very disappointing
review_data.content: Being a Monocle magazine reader & fan, I was looking forward to finally be in a Monocle cafe. It was a sunny Sunday morning, so I was preparing to spend a long time enjoying a good breakfast moment with my wife. Alas....everything was so disappointing:...More

review_data.title: Tolle Kombination von Ambiente und Kaffee!
review_data.content: Das Monocle besticht durch seine witzige Kombination von Shop, Kaffee- und Leseecke. An wenigen Tischen kann man, im Sommer auch...More

review_data.title: Oltre la media
review_data.content: Sinceramente stupito per un posto come questo. Ambiente piacevole e di design. Moderno e cool, con ottime proposte e servizio....More

review_data.title: A Coffee experience
review_data.content: They have more than coffee but we love it to just sit and enjoy the people walking by, the graciousness of staff and the excellent cappuccino and coffee. A Zurich favorite.

review_data.title: Cool place poor service
review_data.content: We were there today. Although there were 4 people behind the counter nobody came. I supposed we needed to go to the counter. But once we approached they were not friendly so we left.

review_data.title: Monocle Style in ZHR
review_data.content: As expected from Monocle: excellent coffee (and matcha latte) and some nice cakes, lots of different magazines ( some to buy and some to read) as well as a nicely curated little shop. All rolled into one. It has a lovely sophisticated, stylish feel. Only...More

review_data.title: GOOD READS !
review_data.content: This is a new place in Seefeld. Monocle has a good selection of things to read (both for free and to buy). The coffee is good but I especially like the atmosphere.

review_data.title: Love this place
review_data.content: The espresso is very good 4 CHF, which is expensive but the usual price in Zurich. The place is very cozy, super cool with a great service. Besides a coffee shop it also sells other things as clothes, bags, and others with great designs but...More

review_data.title: Coffee, Drinks, Menswear, News
review_data.content: Monocle is a cafe and more. This little shop has hot/cold drinks, breads, pastries, bar, newsstand, book shop, and exclusive men’s clothing. The café is open seven days a week and staffed by two very welcoming gentlemen on my visit. I ordered a soy milk...More

review_data.title: A sweet and quiet elegance
review_data.content: We went there often for coffee. My husband said the cappuccino was the best. The service is so very kind and friendly.

review_data.title: Coffee in style
review_data.content: What are you talking about? A nice café...?? Ladies and gentlemen, this is the monocle café in Zurich!! Of course it is one of a kind, with supreme coffee and snacks, newspapers and magazines and one of the best host and staff! The interior is...More

review_data.title: Klein aber oho!
review_data.content: Dieses Kaffee ist sehr versteckt in der Nähe von Zürich Bellevue und ein echter Insider. Man betritt den Shop und...More

review_data.title: Great Coffee Shop, One of a kind
review_data.content: Fantastic place to have a good cup of coffee and a cheese cake! Mentioning the Cheese Cake it is one of the best I ever tasted! truly devine..

review_data.title: For readers
review_data.content: A nice place to meet likeminded people. A kiosk where you can read NZZ (or the latest Monocle, of course) and drink your daily cappuccino.

review_data.title: Great neighbourhood cafe, with lots of magazines to buy and a small shop
review_data.content: Greta for a coffee and a cake. Sells a few selected designer items. Has a clothing store, trunk, next door Über helpful staff. Nice place to just hang out of a morning
